resources.string: You have reached the daily summary limit.
Click the button below to generate a summary.
There are no notifications on your phone at the moment.
Unable to connect, please check your network settings.
Unknown error, please try again later.
Server error, please try again later.
The server is busy, please try again later.
Please check if your API key is valid.
Please check your API key quota or contact the developers.
I agree to the privacy policy.
Notification permission has not been enabled yet
Click OK to enable the permission.

NotiSummary utilizes ChatGPT to generate text summaries of notifications. Hence, though this is an application that does not collect your data, we are not responsible for the privacy practices of OpenAI.

If you're concerned about data privacy, this app offers the option to exclude specific notification details from the summary generated by ChatGPT.

To modify this setting, navigate to "âš™ï¸" > "Summary Scope (Notification)" and make the necessary adjustments.
Summarize these notifications in a brief statement.
ChatGPT or generative AI related forums
How did you learn about our app?
Please head over to Google Play Store for the latest fixes.
To get started, enable notification access for NotiSummary
You have not enabled notification access.
You can click the button in the corner to add a prompt, providing clear instructions to let ChatGPT know how to summarize notifications for you.

You can click the button in the corner to add a new summary schedule, allowing the APP to automatically generate summaries at specified times. You can also select "Open Push Notification" to have the APP notify you when a summary is generated.
You can select the applications to be included in the notification summary here.
You can choose the notification details to be included in the summary here.

You can perform a certain number of free summaries every day, but if you use your own OpenAI API key, there are no such restrictions. If you wish to use your own API key, you can add it by clicking the button in the corner.
The following are my smartphone notifications.
These are summaries of subsets of my notifications, generated with the prompt "
". Please integrate them in policy of the original prompt."
NotiSummary requires your own OpenAI API key to utilize notification summaries.
